---
category: news
title: "On the Expressivity of Markov Reward"
excerpt: "Our main results prove that while reward can express many tasks, there exist instances of each task type that no Markov reward function can capture. We then provide a set of polynomial-time algorithms that construct a reward function which allows an agent to optimize tasks of each of these three types,"
publishedDateTime: 2022-12-01T00:00:00Z
